sections.heading: Additions; plat; vacation of part; rights of owners
sections.text: When any part of a plat shall be vacated as provided in section 18-3308, the owners of the lots so vacated may enclose the streets, alleys, and public grounds adjoining such lots in equal proportions.SourceLaws 1879, ยง 110, p. 235;R.S.1913, ยง 5098;
